Brazil's ex-president Bolsonaro placed in preventive detention following an astonishing escape attempt
subhead: Under house arrest as he pursues his final appeals against a conviction for attempting a coup, the far-right former president tried to burn through his electronic ankle monitor. He has since been placed in isolation.

title: Formula 1: Verstappen wins Las Vegas Grand Prix as McLarens are disqualified
subhead: A fifth straight Formula 1 title is now within Max Verstappen's grasp after the disqualifications of Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri, which cut his deficit to Norris to just 24 points with two races left.

title: Five winter walks by the sea in France
subhead: Le Monde is taking you on a trip. Let's go to the island of Ouessant, Argelès, Lacanau, Saint-Malo and Mont-Saint-Michel, popular destinations for summer visitors, but just as attractive in winter. And you will (almost) be the only ones to enjoy it.

title: China ramps up retaliatory measures against Japan, suspending travel and seafood purchases
subhead: Since Japanese PM Sanae Takaichi declared her support for Taiwan, tensions between the two powers have escalated. Beijing wants to pressure Tokyo into reversing its position while deterring other countries from expressing support for Taiwan.

title: 'He looked me up and down': Hostesses, flight attendants and waitresses speak out about everyday sexualization
subhead: Crude jokes, inappropriate stares and overt flirting are commonplace for women in service jobs where physical appearance is paramount. Employees remain poorly protected from this sexualization, which can amount to harassment.
